title: Dias e Sousa (Bartolomeu dos Martires)
body: He was a deputy for Madeira in the legislative sessions from 1842 to 1845 and in 1846. He was a graduate in canons and participated in the campaigns for freedom. He distinguished himself as a politician and journalist. It was said that he was a man of profound intellectual culture. He was born on July 27, 1806, and died on January 7, 1872.

Bartolomeu dos Martires Dias e Sousa: Deputy for Madeira in the legislative sessions from 1842 to 1845 and in 1846. Graduated in canons, participated in the campaigns for freedom, and distinguished himself as a politician and journalist. He was born on July 27, 1806, and died on January 7, 1872.

1872: Death of Bartolomeu dos Martires Dias e Sousa
